Package com.example.aventurasdemarcoyluis.model.npc

Interface SpinyCombat

All Known Implementing Classes:
Spiny
public interface SpinyCombat
This interface implements different methods in charge of giving you a spiny combat system in the game. Different types of attacks are implemented for the enemies use, and attacks that can be received for the players.
Author:
Christian Jesus Parra Cofre
See Also:
AbstractPlayers
